name: Abraxix
description:
Abraxix is an Animated Mandala Accompanied by an original esoteric soundtrack. The Piece is performed after meditating on the mindala after it is drawn to capture the essence of the visuals into sound.

Details:
Dragons represent wisdom in many cultures, Abraxix tries to bring a surreal element to the Mindala Genesis collection.
The music on this piece is performed by an ancient Iranian Instrument Called the Tanbour, The Tanbour has been used exclusively in religious rituals, especially by the Sufis to achieve higher states of consciousness.
it is going a different route from the more abstract pieces that experienced with colors only, this piece is trying to put your mind in a higher state.
 

Abraxix is part of the Mindala Genesis Collection. A collection of mandalas, drawn in a state of meditation digitally, these Mandalas try to encapsulate the sensation of experiencing higher states of consciousness . for more information visit https://razmard.com/portfolio/mindala-nft-collection/
